name: Greek Lemon Potatoes
ingredients: 2.5 lb – Potatoes, starchy not waxy potatoes
instructions: Peal and cut potatoes into thick wedges 3cm thick
Place potatoes in roasting pan with all other ingredients, except for garnish
Turn potatoes and then roast for another 25 to 30 minutes until liquid is absorbed and mainly oil is lef in the pan
Transfer potatoes to a separate tray
Get the oil from the original pan and drizzle over potatoes in the new pan
Roast again for 35 to 40 minutes, turning once or twice until golden and crispy on the edges
Return potatoes to pan 1 with the garlic lemon juices to roast in oven for the last 5-10 minutes

additional_context.tips: Pairs well with roast chicken or lamb.
